notes.reading-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON READING PASSAGE
TOPIC: earthquakes on San Andreas fault
why earthquakes occur on San Andreas fault:
860-mile (1,300-kilometer) fault where Pacific and American plates meet in California
Pacific plate moving north in relation to American fault (Los Angeles in Alaska in 70 million years)
earthquakes caused by movement of plates
notes.listening-notes:
SAMPLE NOTES ON LISTENING PASSAGE
TOPIC: major earthquake (San Francisco, 1906) along San Andreas fault
notable characteristics of San Francisco earthquake:
length of rupture (breaking apart along fault) = 290 miles (430 kilometers)
length of offset (movement of sides of fault in relation to each other) = 21 feet (7 meters) in some places
